text_logic_form: Point $A$ is the midpoint of the leg of trapezoid $JKLM$.
Point $B$ is also the midpoint of the leg of trapezoid $JKLM$.
The length of the line $AB$ is $57$ units.
The length of the line $KL$ is $21$ units.
Find the length of the line $JM$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $A$ is the midpoint of the leg of trapezoid $JKLM$.
Point $B$ is also the midpoint of the leg of trapezoid $JKLM$.
The length of the line $AB$ is $57$ units.
The length of the line $KL$ is $21$ units.
Find the length of the line $JM$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $KL$ is $21$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $57$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $K$ and $J$.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $L$ and $M$.
line_instances: There are lines $KJ$, $KA$, $KL$, $JM$, $JA$, $AB$, $LM$, $LB$, and $MB$, forming the trapezoid and its legs.
